context: It is a fundamental property of antennas that the electrical characteristics of an antenna described in the next section, such as gain, <a3_0>radiation pattern<a3_0/>, impedance, bandwidth, resonant frequency and polarization, are <a0_0>the same<a0_0/> whether the antenna is transmitting or receiving.
